definitions.definition: A contagious disease can be caught by touching someone who has the disease or a piece of infected clothing:
examples: The infection is highly contagious, so don't let anyone else use your towel.

definitions.definition: A contagious person has a contagious disease:
examples: Keep him out of school until he's not contagious anymore.

definitions.definition: A contagious feeling spreads quickly among people:
